title: These are some most important and precious advices everyone should read ðŸ’œðŸ™‚
explanation: This quote emphasizes the value of advice and wisdom, which should be treasured and followed by everyone.

title: Take risks in your life. If you win, you can lead; if you lose, you can guide.
explanation: Taking risks is necessary for growth. Winning enables leadership, while losing teaches valuable lessons to guide others.

title: People are not what they say but what they do; so judge them not from their words but from their actions.
explanation: Actions speak louder than words. People's true nature is revealed through their actions, not their promises.

title: When someone hurts you, don't feel bad because it's a law of nature that the tree that bears the sweetest fruits gets maximum number of stones.
explanation: This highlights the idea that successful people often face the most challenges, just like fruitful trees endure the most attacks.

title: Take whatever you can from your life because when life starts taking from you, it takes even your last breath.
explanation: Life is short, and it's important to seize every opportunity because eventually, time will take everything from us.

title: In this world, people will always throw stones on the path of your success. It depends on what you make from them - a wall or a bridge.
explanation: Challenges can either be barriers or stepping stones, depending on how you approach them.

title: Challenges make life interesting; overcoming them make life meaningful.
explanation: Challenges bring excitement to life, and conquering them brings fulfillment and purpose.

title: There is no joy in victory without running the risk of defeat.
explanation: The excitement of victory is meaningful only when there is a real possibility of failure.

title: A path without obstacles leads nowhere.
explanation: Challenges are necessary for growth. A smooth, obstacle-free life leads to stagnation.

title: Past is a nice place to visit but certainly not a good place to stay.
explanation: Reflecting on the past can be useful, but dwelling on it prevents progress.

title: You can't have a better tomorrow if you are thinking about yesterday all the time.
explanation: Focusing on the past hinders progress toward a better future.

title: If what you did yesterday still looks big to you, then you haven't done much today.
explanation: If you're still proud of yesterday's achievements, you haven't accomplished anything significant today.

title: If you don't build your dreams, someone else will hire you to build theirs.
explanation: If you don't pursue your goals, you will end up working to fulfill someone else's dreams.

title: If you don't climb the mountain; you can't view the plain.
explanation: To enjoy the rewards, you must first put in the effort to overcome challenges.

title: Don't leave it idle - use your brain.
explanation: Encourages people to think and be proactive instead of wasting their mental potential.

title: You are not paid for having brain, you are only rewarded for using it intelligently.
explanation: Intelligence alone isn't enough; success comes from applying it effectively.

title: It is not what you don't have that limits you; it is what you have but don't know how to use.
explanation: Your potential is not limited by what you lack but by your failure to make the most of what you have.

title: What you fail to learn might teach you a lesson.
explanation: Missed opportunities for learning often turn into life's toughest lessons.

title: The difference between a corrupt person and an honest person is: The corrupt person has a price while the honest person has a value.
explanation: Corruption comes with a price, but honesty is rooted in integrity and cannot be bought.

title: If you succeed in cheating someone, don't think that the person is a fool...... Realize that the person trusted you much more than you deserved.
explanation: Cheating someone doesn't make you smart; it only highlights how much trust they placed in you.

title: Honesty is an expensive gift; don't expect it from cheap people.
explanation: Honesty is a rare and valuable trait that shouldn't be expected from those with low integrity.
